article_text: John talks about it being Friday the 13th. He goes into what goes on with The Price Is Right. 'Emperor Obama' has new mandates on public school bathrooms. Texas is already refusing to do it. Obamacare took a hit in court yesterday. The former Observer building will disappear. John will be moving into his new house this weekend. Caller comments on being in a storm and another watched an interesting nature show. Obama Administration says that all public schools will let students use the bathroom to which gender they identify as. Callers comment on the bathroom issue.
